definition: to run a school
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with
to learn/to study/to imitate/science/-ology
to run a school diligently and thriftily

sentences.english: A privately-run school shall have the qualifications of a legal person.
sentences.chinese: 民辦學校應當具備法人條件。

sentences.english: Article 46 Privately-run schools shall enjoy preferential taxation policy formulated by the State.
sentences.chinese: 第四十六條民辦學校享受國家規定的稅收優惠政策。

sentences.english: Combined with the well-known institutions, the Department of labor and personnel departments cooperation in running schools.
sentences.chinese: 聯合各知名院校，各勞動部門和人事部門合作辦學。

sentences.english: What's the educational characteristic of International College?
sentences.chinese: 國際學院有什麼辦學特色？

sentences.english: The State encourages Chinese-foreign cooperation in running schools to which high-quality foreign educational resources are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 國家鼓勵引進外國優質教育資源的中外合作辦學。

sentences.english: Article 58 When a privately-run school is to be terminated, it shall make financial settlement according to law.
sentences.chinese: 第五十八條民辦學校終止時，應當依法進行財務清算。

sentences.english: TV continues to keep the system running characteristics, independent school.
sentences.chinese: 電大繼續保持系統辦學特色，相對獨立辦學。

sentences.english: TV continues to keep the system running characteristics, independent school.
sentences.chinese: 電大繼續保持系統辦學特色，相對獨立辦學。

sentences.english: Pan Xulun best schools, and thousands of disciples, peaches and plums fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 潘序倫全力辦學，十萬弟子，桃李芬芳。

sentences.english: Private colleges in public universities are a new operating form of higher-learning institutes.
sentences.chinese: 新制獨立學院是一種新的辦學組織形式。

sentences.english: Higher vocational education is the important aspect of multi-form running school in undergraduate university.
sentences.chinese: 高職教育是本科院校多種形式辦學的一個重要方面。

sentences.english: The school characteristic mainly manifests, in the agricultural science and technology education unifies on.
sentences.chinese: 學校的辦學特色主要體現在農科教相結合上。

sentences.english: Article 57 When a privately-run school is to be terminated, it shall make proper arrangements for the students in school.
sentences.chinese: 第五十七條民辦學校終止時，應當妥善安置在校學生。

sentences.english: Running schools has been heading for social-centred in the 21 st century.
sentences.chinese: 21世紀的大學，已走向社會中心辦學。

sentences.english: Law about governments administration to civilian operated schools should regularize it.
sentences.chinese: 法律應規範政府對民辦學校的管理行爲。

sentences.english: Beijing Jingshan School was founded in 1960.
sentences.chinese: 辦學特色北京景山學校創辦於1960年。
